message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs. Considering its value to you, I propose a price of $10000. This is a special offer considering the high demand and limited availability of the product.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product. I would like to counteroffer at $8500.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your valuation of the product and appreciate your willingness to pay more. In light of this, I am willing to consider a price of $9000 for the product. I believe this strikes a good balance between our interests.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I would like to counteroffer at $8700.

Thank you for your latest counteroffer, Bob. I've considered your proposal carefully and decided to adjust my offer slightly. I am now willing to sell the product for $8900. I hope this price aligns better with both our interests.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I would like to counteroffer at $8800.

I appreciate your continued interest, Bob. After careful consideration, I am willing to sell the product for $8850. I believe this offers a fair compromise while still ensuring a reasonable profit for me.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I would like to counteroffer at $8750.
Considering your latest counteroffer, Bob, I am willing to sell the product for $8800. I hope this adjusted price meets your expectations and allows us to reach an agreement.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I would like to counteroffer at $8700.
